transcript:
all say that all the plans are good," said Prince Andrew, "I am only surprised at your opinion of Bonaparte. You may laugh as much as you like, but all the same Bonaparte is a great general 1" 
"Michael Ivdnovich!" cried the old prince to the architect who, busy with his roast meat, hoped he had been forgotten: "Didn't I tell you Buonaparte was a great tactician? Here, he says the same thing." 
"To be sure, your excellency," replied the architect. 
The prince again laughed his frigid laugh.
